name: Brian L. Lampe
summary: Full stack developer primarily focused on web applications.

accomplishments: Developed and deployed an iPhone app for a tech podcast called BadVoltage.
Operate a Mountain Biking forum on phpBB3.  Created a topic events calendar and overhauled "thanks" mod in PHP.
This resume page is built using Vue.js and Pure.css
